I come across this manga called , "Hokuso Shinsengumi"created by Kanno Aya, 
in a bookshop today.

The title can be translated as," Shinsengumi running in the North."and as we 
can guess 
from the title, it relates the story around Hijikata in the North  and some 
members of Shinsengumi of late period.

This manga is categorized as Shojo but the drawing is very stylish and story 
isn't typically shojo at all.
I liked the story of Souma Kazue very much.

The cover is here.
http://img.esbooks.co.jp/bks/images/i9/07136189.JPG

And you can see some example pages here clicking the pink book icon.
Then once it has been downloaded, try any button on the navigation bar on the 
left hand to turn or zoom the page.
http://www.hakusensha.co.jp/cgi-bin/comics/comics.cgi?isbn=4592188101&mode=1

Reference on amazon.jp
http://www.amazon.co.jp/exec/obidos/ASIN/4592188101/qid%3D1100878763/249-66024
29-5932318

Tama
